ComicInfo.Title: Special Limited Edition All-Gurch Issue!
ComicInfo.Summary:
This is Gore Shriek volume 2, number 2 1/2, a special issue devoted exclusively to the unique visions of Mr. Gurchain Singh. (transcribed from inside cover)
It consists of a series of black and white single page illustrations by Gruchain Singh.
